entries.name: exp(decimal, numeric)    → BigDecimalclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Computes the value of e (the base of natural logarithms) raised to the power of decimal, to the specified number of digits of precision.

entries.name: log(decimal, numeric)    → BigDecimalclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Computes the natural logarithm of decimal to the specified number of digits of precision, numeric.

entries.name: E(numeric) → BigDecimalclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Computes e (the base of natural logarithms) to the specified number of digits of precision, numeric.

entries.name: PI(numeric) → BigDecimalclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Computes the value of pi to the specified number of digits of precision, numeric.

entries.name: atan(decimal, numeric) → BigDecimalclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Computes the arctangent of decimal to the specified number of digits of precision, numeric.

entries.name: cos(decimal, numeric) → BigDecimalclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Computes the cosine of decimal to the specified number of digits of precision, numeric.

entries.name: sin(decimal, numeric) → BigDecimalclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Computes the sine of decimal to the specified number of digits of precision, numeric.

entries.name: sqrt(decimal, numeric) → BigDecimalclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Computes the square root of decimal to the specified number of digits of precision, numeric.
